articles.description: A week 2 road game left the Falcons still winless on the 2021 season
articles.content: It definitely was not going to be an easy task by any means. Going into Tampa Bay to take on the defending Super Bowl champions was the mountain that awaited the Atlanta Falcons on Sunday, and they d… [+4151 chars]
